service.method: INSERT INTO ICOMVNGL( HOUSE_CODE , VENDOR_CODE , STATUS , ADD_USER_ID , ADD_USER_DEPT , ADD_DATE , ADD_TIME , JOB_STATUS , BP_FLAG , VENDOR_NAME_LOC , SOLE_PROPRIETOR_FLAG , SHIPPER_TYPE , VENDOR_TYPE , IRS_NO , IRS_NO_OLD , BUSINESS_TYPE , INDUSTRY_TYPE , START_DATE , CAPITAL , RESIDENT_NO , ENTRY_DEPT_NAME , ENTRY_USER_NAME , COUNTRY , CITY_CODE , BIZ_CLASS1 , BIZ_CLASS2 , BIZ_CLASS3 , BIZ_CLASS4 , BIZ_CLASS5 , BANK_CODE , DEPOSITOR_NAME , BANK_ACCT , CREDIT_RATING , CREDIT_DATE , IRS_NO_MAIN , COMPANY_REG_NO , ATTACH_NO , SEARCH_KEY , AKONT , ZTERM , ZWELS , BANK_KEY , LANGUAGE , EMP_COUNT1 , EMP_COUNT2 , VENDOR_ID , VENDOR_PASSWORD , HOME_URL , ENGINEER_COUNT , TAX_DIV , ENTRY_TEL , ENTRY_EMAIL , CLASS_GRADE , SUPPLY_ETHICS_VOW )VALUES( ? --HOUSE_CODE ,? --VENDOR_CODE ,? --STATUS ,? --ADD_USER_ID ,? --ADD_USER_DEPT ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') ,SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), 1, 6) ,? --JOB_STATUS ,? --BP_FLAG ,? --VENDOR_NAME_LOC ,? --SOLE_PROPRIETOR_FLAG ,? --SHIPPER_TYPE ,? --VENDOR_TYPE ,? --IRS_NO ,? --IRS_NO_OLD ,? --BUSINESS_TYPE ,? --INDUSTRY_TYPE ,? --START_DATE ,NVL(?,0) --CAPITAL ,? --RESIDENT_NO ,? --ENTRY_DEPT_NAME ,? --ENTRY_USER_NAME ,? --COUNTRY ,? --CITY_CODE ,? --BIZ_CLASS1 ,? --BIZ_CLASS2 ,? --BIZ_CLASS3 ,? --BIZ_CLASS4 ,? --BIZ_CLASS5 ,? --BANK_acct -- HBKID 지급은행(uni) ,? --DEPOSITOR_NAME ,? --BANK_code ----계좌번호 ,? --CREDIT_RATING ,? --CREDIT_DATE ,? --IRS_NO_MAIN ,? --COMPANY_REG_NO ,? --ATTACH_NO ,? --search_key ,? --akont ,? --zterm ,? --zwels ,? --bank_key 은행코드 ,'KO' ,NVL(?,0) ,NVL(?,0) ,? --VENDOR_ID ,? --VENDOR_PASSWORD ,? --HOME_URL ,? --ENGINEER_COUNT ,? --TAX_DIV ,? --ENTRY_TEL ,? --ENTRY_EMAIL ,'D' -- CLASS_GRADE ,'당사는 투명하고 공정한 거래관계가 기업의 가치를 제고하고 상호발전을 이룬다는 것을 깊이 인식하고, 다음 사항을 준수할 것을 서약합니다.' )

INSERT INTO ICOMADDR ( HOUSE_CODE , CODE_NO , CODE_TYPE , ZIP_CODE , PHONE_NO1 , PHONE_NO2 , FAX_NO , ADDRESS_LOC , CEO_NAME_LOC , EMAIL , HOUSE_NUM1 ) VALUES ( ? -- HOUSE_CODE , ? -- CODE_NO , ? -- CODE_TYPE , ? -- ZIP_CODE , ? -- PHONE_NO1 , ? -- PHONE_NO2 , ? -- FAX_NO , ? -- ADDRESS_LOC , ? -- CEO_NAME_LOC , ? -- EMAIL , ? -- house_num1 )

UPDATE ICOMVNGL SET -- ? BANK_CODE = '#BANK_CODE#' , AKONT = '#AKONT#' , ZTERM = '#ZTERM#' , ZWELS = '#ZWELS#' , CHANGE_USER_ID = '#user_id#' , CHANGE_DATE = '#change_date#' , CHANGE_TIME = '#change_time#' WHERE HOUSE_CODE = '#house_code#' AND VENDOR_CODE = '#vendor_code#'

UPDATE ICOMVNGL SET VENDOR_NAME_LOC = ? , BP_FLAG = ? , SOLE_PROPRIETOR_FLAG = ? , SHIPPER_TYPE = ? , VENDOR_TYPE = ? , IRS_NO = ? , IRS_NO_OLD = ? , BUSINESS_TYPE = ? , INDUSTRY_TYPE = ? , START_DATE = ? , CAPITAL = ? , RESIDENT_NO = ? , ENTRY_DEPT_NAME = ? , ENTRY_USER_NAME = ? , COUNTRY = ? , CITY_CODE = ? , BIZ_CLASS1 = ? , BIZ_CLASS2 = ? , BIZ_CLASS3 = ? , BIZ_CLASS4 = ? , BIZ_CLASS5 = ? , BANK_CODE = ? , DEPOSITOR_NAME = ? , BANK_ACCT = ? , CREDIT_RATING = ? , CREDIT_DATE = ? , IRS_NO_MAIN = ? , COMPANY_REG_NO = ? , ATTACH_NO = ? , SEARCH_KEY = ? , AKONT = ? , ZTERM = ? , ZWELS = ? , BANK_KEY = ? , EMP_COUNT1 = ? , EMP_COUNT2 = ? , HOME_URL = ? , ENGINEER_COUNT = ? , TAX_DIV = ? , ENTRY_TEL = ? , ENTRY_EMAIL = ? , CHANGE_USER_ID = '#user_id#' , CHANGE_DATE = '#change_date#' , CHANGE_TIME = '#change_time#' , LANGUAGE = 'KO' WHERE HOUSE_CODE = ? AND VENDOR_CODE = ?
UPDATE ICOMADDR SET ZIP_CODE = ? , PHONE_NO1 = ? , PHONE_NO2 = ? , FAX_NO = ? , ADDRESS_LOC = ? , CEO_NAME_LOC = ? , EMAIL = ? , HOUSE_NUM1 = ? WHERE HOUSE_CODE = ? AND CODE_NO = ? AND CODE_TYPE = ?

SELECT PROJECT_NAME ,PROJECT_YEAR ,convert_date(ENT_FROM_DATE) AS ENT_FROM_DATE ,convert_date(ENT_TO_DATE) AS ENT_TO_DATE ,CUSTOMER_NAME ,MAIN_CONT_NAME ,CUR ,PROJECT_AMT ,HOUSE_CODE ,VENDOR_CODE ,SEQ ,PROJECT_TYPE ,REMARK FROM ICOMVNPJ WHERE HOUSE_CODE = ${house_code} AND VENDOR_CODE = ${vendor_code} ORDER BY ENT_FROM_DATE DESC

INSERT INTO ICOMVNPJ ( HOUSE_CODE , VENDOR_CODE , SEQ , PROJECT_NAME , PROJECT_YEAR , ENT_FROM_DATE , ENT_TO_DATE , CUSTOMER_NAME , MAIN_CONT_NAME , CUR , PROJECT_AMT , PROJECT_TYPE , REMARK , STATUS , ADD_DATE , ADD_TIME , ADD_USER_ID , CHANGE_DATE , CHANGE_TIME , CHANGE_USER_ID ) SELECT ${house_code} , ${vendor_code} , (SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SEQ)),0) + 1 FROM ICOMVNPJ WHERE HOUSE_CODE = '#house_code#' AND VENDOR_CODE = '#vendor_code#' AND STATUS != 'D') , ${PROJECT_NAME} , ${PROJECT_YEAR} , ${ENT_FROM_DATE} , ${ENT_TO_DATE} , ${CUSTOMER_NAME} , ${MAIN_CONT_NAME} , ${CUR} , ${PROJECT_AMT} , ${PROJECT_TYPE} , ${REMARK} , 'C' , '#add_date#' , '#add_time#' , '#user_id#' , '#add_date#' , '#add_time#' , '#user_id#' from dual

SELECT USER_NAME , DIVISION , GETICOMCODE2(HOUSE_CODE,'M106',POSITION) AS TEXT_POSITION , PHONE_NO , EMAIL , MOBILE_NO , FAX_NO , POSITION , HOUSE_CODE , COMPANY_CODE , VENDOR_CODE , SEQ FROM ICOMVNCP WHERE HOUSE_CODE = ${house_code} AND VENDOR_CODE = ${vendor_code} AND STATUS != 'D' ORDER BY USER_NAME
SELECT CODE, TEXT1 FROM SCODE WHERE TYPE ='#code#' AND HOUSE_CODE ='#house_code#' AND NVL(DEL_FLAG, 'N') = 'N' AND USE_FLAG = 'Y'

INSERT INTO ICOMVNCP ( HOUSE_CODE , COMPANY_CODE , VENDOR_CODE , SEQ , PHONE_NO , USER_NAME , DIVISION , FAX_NO , MOBILE_NO , EMAIL , POSITION , STATUS , ADD_DATE , ADD_TIME , ADD_USER_ID , CHANGE_DATE , CHANGE_TIME , CHANGE_USER_ID ) SELECT ${house_code} , ${company_code} , ${vendor_code} , NVL((SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0) + 1 FROM ICOMVNCP WHERE HOUSE_CODE = '#house_code#' AND COMPANY_CODE = '#company_code#' AND VENDOR_CODE = '#vendor_code#' ),1) , ${PHONE_NO} , ${USER_NAME} , ${DIVISION} , ${FAX_NO} , ${MOBILE_NO} , ${EMAIL} , ${POSITION} , 'C' , '#add_date#' , '#add_time#' , '#user_id#' , '#add_date#' , '#add_time#' , '#user_id#' from dual

UPDATE ICOMVNGL SET JOB_STATUS = 'P' , SIGN_STATUS = '' , CHANGE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , CHANGE_TIME = SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), 1, 6) , CHANGE_USER_ID = '#user_id#' WHERE HOUSE_CODE = '#house_code#' AND VENDOR_CODE = '#vendor_code#'
UPDATE SSGVN SET REGISTRY_FLAG = 'N' WHERE HOUSE_CODE = '#house_code#' AND VENDOR_CODE = '#vendor_code#'

SELECT distinct VW.VENDOR_TYPE_NAME , VW.VENDOR_COND_NAME , VW.VENDOR_CODE , VW.VENDOR_NAME_LOC , VW.COUNTRY_NAME , VW.INDUSTRY_TYPE , VW.USER_NAME , VW.PHONE_NO , VW.EMAIL , VW.CREDIT_RATING , VW.IRS_NO , case VW.GL_BLOCK_FLAG when 'N' then '거래' else '중지' end GL_BLOCK_FLAG , VW.PU_BLOCK_FLAG , VW.CEO_NAME_LOC , VW.MOBILE_NO , getIcomcode2(VW.HOUSE_CODE,'M004',VW.COUNTRY || VW.CITY_CODE) as CITY_NAME , (SELECT BUSINESS_TYPE FROM ICOMVNGL WHERE VENDOR_CODE = VW.VENDOR_CODE) AS BUSINESS_TYPE FROM VENDOR_LIST_VW VW <OPT=F,S> WHERE VW.HOUSE_CODE = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND VW.VENDOR_TYPE = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND VW.VENDOR_CODE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND VW.IRS_NO LIKE '%' || replace(?, '-', '') || '%' </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND VW.VENDOR_NAME_LOC LIKE '%' || ? || '%' </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND VW.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' </OPT>
AND EXISTS (SELECT VENDOR_CODE FROM ICOIGRDT GR, ICOMMTGL MT WHERE GR.HOUSE_CODE = MT.HOUSE_CODE AND GR.ITEM_NO = MT.ITEM_NO AND GR.VENDOR_CODE = VW.VENDOR_CODE AND GR.HOUSE_CODE = VW.HOUSE_CODE AND GR.SIGN_CLOSING_DATE IS NOT NULL <OPT=S,S> AND MT.ITEM_GROUP = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND GR.SIGN_CLOSING_DATE BETWEEN ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND ? </OPT> )
<OPT=S,S> AND VW.SOLE_PROPRIETOR_FLAG LIKE '%' || ? || '%' </OPT>

SELECT GL.HOUSE_CODE , GL.VENDOR_CODE , GL.VENDOR_TYPE , GL.VENDOR_COND , GL.BP_FLAG , GL.VENDOR_NAME_LOC , GL.VENDOR_NAME_ENG , GL.COUNTRY , GL.CITY_CODE , GL.LANGUAGE , GL.DUNS_NO , GL.IRS_NO , GL.IRS_NO_OLD , GL.IRS_CHANGE_DATE , GL.COMPANY_REG_NO , GL.FOUNDATION_DATE , GL.VAT_APP_TYPE , GL.INDUSTRY_TYPE , GL.BUSINESS_TYPE , GL.GROUP_COMPANY_CODE , GL.GROUP_COMPANY_NAME , GL.TRADE_REG_NO , GL.MAIN_PRODUCT , GL.CREDIT_RATING , GL.SOLE_PROPRIETOR_FLAG , GL.RESIDENT_NO , GL.EDI_FLAG , GL.EDI_ID , GL.EDI_QUALIFIER , GL.CUSTOMS_COMPANY_CODE , GL.PAYEE_FLAG , GL.SHIPPER_FLAG , GL.PURCHASE_BLOCK_FLAG , GL.STATUS , GL.FREE_EXPORT_COMPANY , GL.DISCOUNT_FLAG , GL.PAY_TO_LOCATION , GL.SIGN_STATUS , GL.SIGN_DATE , GL.SIGN_PERSON_ID , GL.COMPANY_TYPE , GL.EVALUATION_FLAG , GL.SHIPPER_TYPE , GL.SEARCH_KEY , GL.JOB_STATUS , GL.ATTACH_NO , GL.ATTACH_NO2 --, (SELECT count(*) FROM ICOMATCH WHERE DOC_NO=attach_no) as attach_count , (SELECT count(*) FROM sfile WHERE DOC_NO=attach_no) as attach_count , GL.CTRL_CODE , GL.ETAX_BILL_FLAG , GL.ENTRY_DEPT_NAME , GL.ENTRY_USER_NAME , GL.DEPOSITOR_NAME , GL.BANK_ACCT , GL.CREDIT_DATE , GL.IRS_NO_MAIN , GL.EBIZ_FLAG , CONVERT_DATE(GL.START_DATE) AS START_DATE , (SELECT NVL(Z_ECREDIT_LINK_FLAG,'N') FROM ICOMCMGL WHERE HOUSE_CODE = '#house_code#' AND COMPANY_CODE = '#company_code#') AS ECREDIT_FLAG , GL.ADD_DATE , GL.ADD_USER_ID , GL.ADD_USER_DEPT , GL.CHANGE_DATE , GL.CHANGE_USER_ID , GL.CHANGE_USER_DEPT , GL.BIZ_CLASS1 , GL.BIZ_CLASS2 , GL.BIZ_CLASS3 , GL.BIZ_CLASS4 , GL.BIZ_CLASS5 , DR.ZIP_CODE , DR.PHONE_NO1 AS PHONE_NO1 , DR.PHONE_NO2 AS PHONE_NO2 , DR.FAX_NO AS FAX_NO , DR.HOMEPAGE , DR.ADDRESS_LOC , DR.ADDRESS_ENG , DR.CEO_NAME_LOC , DR.CEO_NAME_ENG , DR.EMAIL , DR.HOUSE_NUM1 , lpad(gl.BANK_CODE, 5, 0) as bank_code , gl.BANK_KEY , gl.akont , gl.zterm , gl.zwels , GETICOMCODE2(GL.HOUSE_CODE, 'M025', SHIPPER_TYPE) AS TEXT_SHIPPER_TYPE , GETICOMCODE2(GL.HOUSE_CODE, 'M001', COUNTRY) AS TEXT_COUNTRY , GETICOMCODE2(GL.HOUSE_CODE, 'M013', LANGUAGE) AS TEXT_LANGUAGE , GETICOMCODE2(GL.HOUSE_CODE, 'M082', VAT_APP_TYPE) AS TEXT_VAT_APP_TYPE , GETICOMCODE2(GL.HOUSE_CODE, 'M071', VENDOR_COND) AS TEXT_VENDOR_COND , GETICOMCODE2(GL.HOUSE_CODE, 'M076', VENDOR_TYPE) AS TEXT_VENDOR_TYPE , GETICOMCODE2(GL.HOUSE_CODE, 'M143', COMPANY_TYPE) AS TEXT_COMPANY_TYPE , GETICOMCODE2(GL.HOUSE_CODE, 'M004', CITY_CODE) AS TEXT_CITY_CODE , GL.EMP_COUNT1 , GL.EMP_COUNT2 , GL.CAPITAL , GL.HOME_URL , GL.ENGINEER_COUNT , GL.TAX_DIV , GL.ENTRY_TEL , GL.ENTRY_EMAIL FROM ICOMVNGL GL right outer join ICOMADDR DR on DR.HOUSE_CODE= GL.HOUSE_CODE AND DR.CODE_NO = GL.VENDOR_CODE <OPT=F,S>WHERE GL.HOUSE_CODE = ? </OPT>
<OPT=F,S>AND GL.VENDOR_CODE = ? </OPT>
<OPT=F,S>AND GL.IRS_NO = ? </OPT>
<OPT=F,S>AND GL.RESIDENT_NO = ? </OPT>
AND GL.STATUS != 'D'

SELECT (CASE WHEN VG.JOB_STATUS = 'P' THEN '승인대기' WHEN VG.JOB_STATUS = 'R' THEN '반려' WHEN VG.JOB_STATUS = 'E' THEN '승인' END) AS JOB_STATUS_DESC ,VG.JOB_STATUS ,VG.VENDOR_CODE ,GETVENDORNAME(VG.HOUSE_CODE, VG.VENDOR_CODE) AS VENDOR_NAME ,AR.CEO_NAME_LOC ,VG.INDUSTRY_TYPE ,VG.BUSINESS_TYPE ,VG.CREDIT_RATING ,VG.REMARK ,GETICOMCODE1(VG.HOUSE_CODE, 'M100', VG.SIGN_STATUS) AS SIGN_STATUS_DESC ,VG.SIGN_STATUS ,SP.SIGN_REMARK ,AR.ADDRESS_LOC ,VG.SHIPPER_TYPE ,VG.VENDOR_TYPE ,VG.IRS_NO ,VG.REG_REMARK ,VG.TECH_RISE FROM ICOMADDR AR, ICOMVNGL VG LEFT OUTER JOIN ICOMSCTP SP ON VG.HOUSE_CODE = SP.HOUSE_CODE AND VG.VENDOR_CODE = SP.DOC_NO WHERE VG.HOUSE_CODE = AR.HOUSE_CODE AND VG.VENDOR_CODE = AR.CODE_NO AND AR.CODE_TYPE = '2' AND VG.STATUS <> 'D' AND VG.JOB_STATUS != 'D' AND NVL(VG.SIGN_STATUS,'P') != 'E' <OPT=F,S> AND VG.HOUSE_CODE = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND VG.ADD_DATE BETWEEN ? </OPT><OPT=S,S> AND ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND VG.VENDOR_CODE = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND VG.VENDOR_NAME_LOC LIKE '%' || ? || '%' </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND VG.JOB_STATUS = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND VG.SIGN_STATUS = ? </OPT>

UPDATE ICOMVNGL SET REG_REMARK = ? , TECH_RISE = ? , CUSTOMER = ? , SIGN_STATUS = 'P' , JOB_STATUS = 'P' , CHANGE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , CHANGE_TIME = SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), 1, 6) , CHANGE_USER_ID = ?
, AKONT = ? --AKONT , ZTERM = ? --ZTERM , ZWELS = ? --ZWELS , BANK_CODE = ? --HBKID
WHERE HOUSE_CODE = ? AND VENDOR_CODE = ?

SELECT (CASE WHEN VG.JOB_STATUS = 'P' THEN '승인대기' WHEN VG.JOB_STATUS = 'R' THEN '반려' WHEN VG.JOB_STATUS = 'E' THEN '승인' END) AS JOB_STATUS_DESC ,VG.JOB_STATUS ,VG.VENDOR_CODE ,GETVENDORNAME(VG.HOUSE_CODE, VG.VENDOR_CODE) AS VENDOR_NAME ,AR.CEO_NAME_LOC ,VG.INDUSTRY_TYPE ,VG.BUSINESS_TYPE ,VG.CREDIT_RATING ,VG.REMARK ,GETICOMCODE1(VG.HOUSE_CODE, 'M100', VG.SIGN_STATUS) AS SIGN_STATUS_DESC ,VG.SIGN_STATUS ,SP.SIGN_REMARK ,AR.ADDRESS_LOC ,VG.SHIPPER_TYPE ,VG.VENDOR_TYPE ,VG.IRS_NO ,VN.RECOMMEND_REASON REG_REMARK ,VG.TECH_RISE /* ,(CASE WHEN VG.BIZ_CLASS1 = '1' THEN '상품' ELSE '' END)|| (CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN VG.BIZ_CLASS1 = '1' THEN '상품' ELSE '' END) = '' THEN '' ELSE ', ' END)|| (CASE WHEN VG.BIZ_CLASS2 = '1' THEN '용역' ELSE '' END)|| (CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN VG.BIZ_CLASS2 = '1' THEN '상품' ELSE '' END) = '' THEN '' ELSE ', ' END)|| (CASE WHEN VG.BIZ_CLASS3 = '1' THEN '유지보수' ELSE '' END)|| (CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN VG.BIZ_CLASS3 = '1' THEN '유지보수' ELSE '' END) = '' THEN '' ELSE ', ' END)|| (CASE WHEN VG.BIZ_CLASS4 = '1' THEN '공사' ELSE '' END) AS BIZ_CLASS4 */ ,(CASE WHEN VG.BIZ_CLASS1 = '1' THEN '상품' ELSE '' END)|| (CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN VG.BIZ_CLASS2 = '1' THEN '상품' ELSE '0' END) = '0' THEN '' ELSE ' / ' END)|| (CASE WHEN VG.BIZ_CLASS2 = '1' THEN '용역' ELSE '' END)|| (CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN VG.BIZ_CLASS3 = '1' THEN '상품' ELSE '0' END) = '0' THEN '' ELSE ' / ' END)|| (CASE WHEN VG.BIZ_CLASS3 = '1' THEN '유지보수' ELSE '' END)|| (CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN VG.BIZ_CLASS4 = '1' THEN '유지보수' ELSE '0' END) = '0' THEN '' ELSE ' / ' END)|| (CASE WHEN VG.BIZ_CLASS4 = '1' THEN '공사' ELSE '' END) AS BIZ_CLASS4 ,GETDOCSUBJECT(SP.HOUSE_CODE, SP.DOC_NO, SP.DOC_TYPE, SP.DOC_SEQ) AS SUBJECT ,SM.ADD_DATE ,SM.ADD_USER_ID ,GETUSERNAMELOC(SM.HOUSE_CODE, SM.ADD_USER_ID) AS ADD_USER_NAME FROM ICOMADDR AR, ICOMVNGL VG ,ICOMSCTP SP, ICOMSCTM SM, SSGVN VN WHERE VG.HOUSE_CODE = AR.HOUSE_CODE AND VG.VENDOR_CODE = AR.CODE_NO AND AR.CODE_TYPE = '2' AND VG.STATUS <> 'D' AND VG.HOUSE_CODE = SP.HOUSE_CODE AND VG.VENDOR_CODE= SP.DOC_NO AND SP.HOUSE_CODE = SM.HOUSE_CODE AND SP.COMPANY_CODE = SM.COMPANY_CODE AND SP.DOC_TYPE = SM.DOC_TYPE AND SP.DOC_NO = SM.DOC_NO AND SP.DOC_SEQ = SM.DOC_SEQ AND VG.HOUSE_CODE = VN.HOUSE_CODE AND VG.VENDOR_CODE = VN.VENDOR_CODE AND rownum < 2 AND VG.JOB_STATUS != 'D' <OPT=F,S> AND VG.HOUSE_CODE = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND VG.ADD_DATE BETWEEN ? </OPT><OPT=S,S> AND ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND VG.VENDOR_CODE = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND VG.VENDOR_NAME_LOC LIKE '%' || ? || '%' </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND VG.JOB_STATUS = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND VG.SIGN_STATUS = ? </OPT>
SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(VENDOR_CODE),0) + 1, 'FM000000') VENDOR_CODE FROM ICOMVNGL WHERE HOUSE_CODE = '#house_code#' AND LENGTH(VENDOR_CODE) != 10

SELECT HU.HOUSE_CODE ,HU.COMPANY_CODE ,HU.HUMAN_NO ,HU.STATUS ,HU.ADD_DATE ,HU.ADD_TIME ,HU.ADD_USER_ID ,HU.CHANGE_DATE ,HU.CHANGE_TIME ,HU.CHANGE_USER_ID ,HU.VENDOR_CODE ,HU.NAME_LOC ,HU.PHONE_NO ,HU.EMAIL ,HU.ZIP_CODE ,HU.ADDRESS_LOC ,HU.FINAL_GRADUATION ,GETICOMCODE1('#house_code#','M172',HU.ASSOCIATION_GRADE) AS ASSOCIATION_GRADE ,GETICOMCODE1('#house_code#','M174',HU.POSITION) AS POSITION ,HU.FIRST_PROJECT_DATE ,HU.REMARK ,HU.RESIDENT_NO AS RESIDENT_NO ,getTelno(HU.MOBILE_NO) AS MOBILE_NO ,HU.MILITARY_SERVICE ,NVL(HU.IT_WORK_PERIOD, '0') AS IT_WORK_PERIOD ,HU.VENDOR_GRADE ,GETICOMCODE1('#house_code#','M173',HU.REGULAR_FLAG) AS REGULAR_FLAG ,HU.JOIN_DATE ,HU.FIRST_PROJECT_VENDOR ,VN.VENDOR_CODE ,VN.VENDOR_NAME_LOC ,HU.ATTACH_NO ,(SELECT count(*) FROM ICOMATCH WHERE DOC_NO = HU.ATTACH_NO) as ATTACH_COUNT FROM ICOMHUMT HU,ICOMVNGL VN WHERE 1=1 <OPT=F,S> AND HU.HOUSE_CODE = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND HU.VENDOR_CODE = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND HU.HUMAN_NO = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND HU.REGULAR_FLAG = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND HU.ASSOCIATION_GRADE = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND HU.NAME_LOC LIKE '%' || ? || '%' </OPT> AND ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ICOMHUPC WHERE HOUSE_CODE = '#house_code#' AND HUMAN_NO = HU.HUMAN_NO AND ( UPPER(PROJECT_NAME) LIKE '%' || UPPER('#PROJECT_CAREER#') || '%' OR UPPER(CUSTOMER_NAME) LIKE '%' || UPPER('#PROJECT_CAREER#') || '%' OR GETICOMCODE1('#house_code#','M178',ROLE_CODE) LIKE '%' || '#PROJECT_CAREER#' || '%') ) > 0 AND HU.STATUS <> 'D' AND HU.HOUSE_CODE = VN.HOUSE_CODE AND HU.VENDOR_CODE = VN.VENDOR_CODE
AND ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ICOMHUSK WHERE HOUSE_CODE = '#house_code#' AND HUMAN_NO = HU.HUMAN_NO AND SKILL_TYPE = '#SKILL_TYPE#' ) > 0
AND ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ICOMHUSK WHERE HOUSE_CODE = '#house_code#' AND HUMAN_NO = HU.HUMAN_NO AND SKILL_TYPE = '#SKILL_TYPE#' AND SKILL_CODE = '#SKILL_CODE#' ) > 0

SELECT HU.HOUSE_CODE ,HU.COMPANY_CODE ,HU.HUMAN_NO ,HU.STATUS ,HU.ADD_DATE ,HU.ADD_TIME ,HU.ADD_USER_ID ,HU.CHANGE_DATE ,HU.CHANGE_TIME ,HU.CHANGE_USER_ID ,HU.VENDOR_CODE ,HU.NAME_LOC ,HU.PHONE_NO ,HU.EMAIL ,HU.ZIP_CODE ,HU.ADDRESS_LOC ,HU.FINAL_GRADUATION ,GETICOMCODE1('#house_code#','M172',HU.ASSOCIATION_GRADE) AS ASSOCIATION_GRADE ,GETICOMCODE1('#house_code#','M174',HU.POSITION) AS POSITION ,HU.FIRST_PROJECT_DATE ,HU.REMARK ,HU.RESIDENT_NO AS RESIDENT_NO ,getTelno(HU.MOBILE_NO) AS MOBILE_NO ,HU.MILITARY_SERVICE ,HU.IT_WORK_PERIOD ,HU.VENDOR_GRADE ,GETICOMCODE1('#house_code#','M173',HU.REGULAR_FLAG) AS REGULAR_FLAG ,HU.JOIN_DATE ,HU.FIRST_PROJECT_VENDOR ,VN.VENDOR_CODE ,VN.VENDOR_NAME_LOC ,HU.ATTACH_NO ,(SELECT count(*) FROM ICOMATCH WHERE DOC_NO = HU.ATTACH_NO) as ATTACH_COUNT FROM ICOMHUMT HU,ICOMVNGL VN WHERE 1=1 <OPT=F,S> AND HU.HOUSE_CODE = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> AND HU.VENDOR_CODE = ? </OPT> AND HU.STATUS <> 'D' AND HU.HOUSE_CODE = VN.HOUSE_CODE AND HU.VENDOR_CODE = VN.VENDOR_CODE

SELECT GL.VENDOR_CODE FROM ICOMVNGL GL <OPT=F,S>WHERE GL.HOUSE_CODE = ? </OPT>
<OPT=F,S>AND GL.VENDOR_CODE = ? </OPT>
<OPT=F,S>AND GL.IRS_NO = ? </OPT>
<OPT=F,S>AND GL.RESIDENT_NO = ? </OPT>
AND GL.STATUS != 'D'

SELECT GETSGNAME(A.PARENT1) AS S_TYPE1, GETSGNAME(A.PARENT2) AS S_TYPE2, GETSGNAME(A.SG) AS S_TYPE3, A.VENDOR_CODE AS VENDOR_CODE, GETCOMPANYNAMELOC(B.HOUSE_CODE, B.VENDOR_CODE, 'S') AS NAME_LOC, B.CREDIT_RATING AS CREDIT_GRADE, B.PURCHASE_BLOCK_FLAG AS PURCHASE_BLOCK_FLAG, B.IRS_NO FROM ( SELECT (SELECT PARENT_SG_REFITEM FROM SSGGL WHERE SG_REFITEM = B.PARENT_SG_REFITEM AND HOUSE_CODE = '#house_code#') AS PARENT1, B.PARENT_SG_REFITEM AS PARENT2, A.SG_REFITEM AS SG, A.VENDOR_CODE, A.HOUSE_CODE FROM SSGVN A, SSGGL B WHERE A.HOUSE_CODE = B.HOUSE_CODE AND A.SG_REFITEM = B.SG_REFITEM AND A.HOUSE_CODE = '#house_code#' AND B.LEVEL_COUNT = '3' AND A.REGISTRY_FLAG = 'Y' AND A.APPLY_FLAG = 'Y' ) A, ICOMVNGL B WHERE A.HOUSE_CODE = B.HOUSE_CODE AND A.VENDOR_CODE = B.VENDOR_CODE AND A.HOUSE_CODE = ${house_code} AND A.VENDOR_CODE = $S{vendor_code}

INSERT INTO ICOMVNGL ( HOUSE_CODE , VENDOR_CODE , STATUS , ADD_DATE , ADD_TIME , ADD_USER_ID , VENDOR_TYPE , VENDOR_COND , VENDOR_NAME_LOC , COUNTRY , CITY_CODE , LANGUAGE , IRS_NO , INDUSTRY_TYPE , BUSINESS_TYPE , SOLE_PROPRIETOR_FLAG , SIGN_STATUS , SIGN_DATE , SIGN_PERSON_ID , SHIPPER_TYPE , JOB_STATUS , ENTRY_DEPT_NAME , ENTRY_USER_NAME , BIZ_CLASS1 , BIZ_CLASS2 , BIZ_CLASS3 , BIZ_CLASS4 , BIZ_CLASS5 , BP_FLAG , CLASS_GRADE , VENDOR_ID , EMP_COUNT2 ) VALUES ( '#house_code#' , REPLACE('#vendor_no#', '-', '') , 'C' , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') , '#user_id#' , 'SU' , 'R' , '#vendor_name#' , 'KR' , '서울' , 'KO' , REPLACE('#vendor_no#', '-', '') , '#industry_type#' , '#business_type#' , 1 , 'E' , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , '#user_id#' , 'D' , 'E' , '1' , '12' , '1' , '1' , '1' , '1' , '0' , '0' , 'E' , REPLACE('#vendor_no#', '-', '') , '0' )

INSERT INTO ICOMLUSR ( HOUSE_CODE , USER_ID , STATUS , ADD_DATE , ADD_TIME , ADD_USER_ID , PASSWORD , COMPANY_CODE , DEPT , POSITION , USER_NAME_LOC , USER_NAME_ENG , LINK_DEPT , LANGUAGE , MENU_TYPE , TIME_ZONE , EMAIL , COUNTRY , CITY_CODE , STATE , PR_LOCATION , EMPLOYEE_NO , RESIDENT_NO , SIGN_STATUS , WORK_TYPE , MENU_PROFILE_CODE , USER_TYPE , MANAGER_POSITION , CTRL_CODE , PASS_CHECK_CNT , PW_RESET_FLAG , PW_RESET_DATE , PHONE_NO , LOGIN_NCY ) VALUES ( '#house_code#' , REPLACE('#vendor_no#', '-', '') , 'C' , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') , '#user_id#' , '179F874B95284FC957FEE6C5482DA85' , REPLACE('#vendor_no#', '-', '') , '' , '00' , '#ceo_name#' , '' , '' , 'KO' , 'G' , 'G08' , '#email_no#' , 'KR' , '서울' , '' , '' , '' , '' , 'A' , 'Z' , 'MUP100300001' , 'S' , '' , '' , 0 , 'Y' , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , '#tel_no#' , 'Y' )

/* 협력업체 기본정보 */ INSERT INTO ICOMADDR ( HOUSE_CODE , CODE_NO , CODE_TYPE , ZIP_CODE , PHONE_NO1 , ADDRESS_LOC , CEO_NAME_LOC , EMAIL ) VALUES ( '#house_code#' , REPLACE('#vendor_no#', '-', '') , 2 , '#zip_code#' , '#tel_no#' , '#address_loc#' , '#ceo_name#' , '#email_no#' )

/* 영업담당자 정보 */ INSERT INTO ICOMVNCP ( HOUSE_CODE , COMPANY_CODE , VENDOR_CODE , SEQ , STATUS , ADD_DATE , ADD_TIME , ADD_USER_ID , USER_NAME , POSITION) VALUES ( '#house_code#' , 'WOORI' , REPLACE('#vendor_no#', '-', '') , 1 , 'C' , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') , '#user_id#' , '#ceo_name#' , '01' )
